member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder
member.summary: Represents an HTML character encoding.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the HtmlEncoder class with the specified settings.
member.param: Settings that control how the instance encodes, primarily which characters to encode.
member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the HtmlEncoder class that specifies characters the encoder is allowed to not encode.
member.param: The set of characters that the encoder is allowed to not encode.
member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Default
member.summary: Gets a built-in instance of the class.
member.returns: A built-in instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.Create(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of JavaScriptEncoder class with the specified settings.

member.returns: A new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.Create(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])

member.summary: Gets a built-in instance of the class.
member.returns: A built-in instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping
member.summary: Gets a built-in JavaScript encoder instance that is less strict about what is encoded.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder
member.summary: The base class of web encoders.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes characters from an array and writes them to a object.
member.param: The stream to which to write the encoded text.
The array of characters to encode.
The array index of the first character to encode.
The number of characters in the array to encode.
member.exception: The method failed. The encoder does not implement correctly.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the specified string to a object.
member.param: The stream to which to write the encoded text.
The string to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes a substring and writes it to a object.
member.param: The stream to which to write the encoded text.
The string whose substring is to be encoded.
The index where the substring starts.
The number of characters in the substring.
member.exception: The method failed. The encoder does not implement correctly.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char},System.Span{System.Char},System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied characters.
member.param: A source buffer containing the characters to encode.
The destination buffer to which the encoded form of will be written.
The number of characters consumed from the buffer.
The number of characters written to the buffer.
to indicate there is no further source data that needs to be encoded; otherwise, .
member.returns: An enumeration value that describes the result of the encoding operation.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied string and returns the encoded text as a new string.
member.param: The string to encode.
member.exception: The method failed. The encoder does not implement correctly.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.EncodeUtf8(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Span{System.Byte},System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied UTF-8 text.
member.param: A source buffer containing the UTF-8 text to encode.
The destination buffer to which the encoded form of will be written.
The number of bytes consumed from the buffer.
The number of bytes written to the buffer.
to indicate there is no further source data that needs to be encoded; otherwise, .
member.returns: A status code that describes the result of the encoding operation.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncode(System.Char*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first character to encode.
member.param: The text buffer to search.
The number of characters in .
member.returns: The index of the first character to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncodeUtf8(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Finds the first element in a UTF-8 text input buffer that would be escaped by the current encoder instance.
member.param: The UTF-8 text input buffer to search.
member.returns: The index of the first element in that would be escaped by the current encoder instance, or -1 if no data in requires escaping.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.MaxOutputCharactersPerInputCharacter
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of characters that this encoder can generate for each input code point.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.TryEncodeUnicodeScalar(System.Int32,System.Char*,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Encodes a Unicode scalar value and writes it to a buffer.
member.param: A Unicode scalar value.
A pointer to the buffer to which to write the encoded text.
The length of the destination in characters.
When the method returns, indicates the number of characters written to the .
member.returns: if is too small to fit the encoded text; otherwise, returns .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.WillEncode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if a given Unicode scalar value will be encoded.
member.param: A Unicode scalar value.
member.returns: if the value will be encoded by this encoder; otherwise, returns .

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings
member.summary: Represents a filter that allows only certain Unicode code points.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an empty filter (allows no code points through by default).

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Instantiates a filter by cloning the allowed list of another object.
member.param: The other object to be cloned.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates a filter where only the character ranges specified by are allowed by the filter.
member.param: The allowed character ranges.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Allows the character specified by through the filter.
member.param: The allowed character.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCharacters(System.Char[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The allowed characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCodePoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Allows all code points specified by .
member.param: The allowed code points.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowRange(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The range of characters to be allowed.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowRanges(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The ranges of characters to be allowed.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.Clear
member.summary: Resets this object by disallowing all characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Disallows the character through the filter.
member.param: The disallowed character.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidCharacters(System.Char[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The disallowed characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidRange(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The range of characters to be disallowed.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidRanges(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.
member.param: The ranges of characters to be disallowed.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.GetAllowedCodePoints
member.summary: Gets an enumerator of all allowed code points.

member.summary: Creates a new that includes a specified number of characters starting at a specified Unicode code point.
member.param: The first code point in the range.
The number of code points in the range.
member.exception: is less than zero or greater than 0xFFFF. -or- is less than zero. -or- plus is greater than 0xFFFF.

member.summary: Creates a new instance from a span of characters.

The last character in the range.
member.returns: A range that includes all characters between and .
